title: I cant log in...
body: I try to log in and the game disappears...WTH!?!??!

replies.body: dont understand how riot can take money from players and not explain why they cant play......I want to see a riot person here
done and updated..... still cant play a %%%%ing game.... wtf is ur issue?
im deleting and reinstalling... better work.... seriously.. wtf....
i press play and nothing happens....this has happened for 2 days now...
